about_the_game:
The ESPIONAGE: Mafia Evolved Special Edition contains the following contents:

EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME BONUSES

  • Exclusive Costume & Alternate Color — Appraiser Moran
  • Five Emotes & Avatars — Panda Squad emotes and avatars representing each role
  • Two Bonus Tracks Added to In-Game Music

FULL SOUNDTRACK DOWNLOAD + EXCLUSIVE SONGS

  • 23 game tracks in MP3 and lossless format
  • Two exclusive tracks — Enter Monarch and Welcome to Espionage (Alternate Version)
  • All future music introduced to the game added as an update to this edition

THE MAKING OF ESPIONAGE: MAFIA EVOLVED

  • A 40+ page PDF catalog documenting unseen concepts, the development history, and more
  • Available only in English

In-game bonuses will be added to your game account upon first successful login. These bonuses are then available across platforms.
